snippet: Long relegated to a closet, a portrait by Jamie Wyeth of the cardiac pioneer Helen Brooke Tassig is to go on view in a retrospective at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
abstract: Portrait by Jamie Wyeth of world-famous cardiologist Helen Brooke Taussig is set to make its first public debut in a retrospective at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston; 1963 portrait, which Taussig found unflattering, had been hidden away in her attic until her death in 1986.
lead_paragraph: Long relegated to a closet, a portrait by Jamie Wyeth of the cardiac pioneer Helen Brooke Tassig is to go on view in a retrospective at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.

headline.seo: A Showing for Jamie Wyeth’s Portrait of a Cardiac Pioneer
headline.main: The Changing Face of a Strong Woman
headline.print_headline: The Changing Face of a Strong Woman
